name: The Guardian Stone
description:
The Guardian Stone is a third person Action Tower Defense Game with Rpg elements and multiplayer. Set in the fantasy world of Elrone, You play as a hero protecting the realm from the forces of evil.


Play the entire game Solo or with up to 3 friends online.


Test your Strategy and skills inside the arena, and check out the player vs player mode where one player takes control of the map and spawns waves of enemy's, with the ability to posses and take direct control of any character they spawn.


Featuring a leveling system with unlockable skills, a talent tree and weapon abilities.


Find Pets and companions with special abilities to help you get through the more challenging levels.
